title: Great product!
content: These are great! Not only are they comfortable on application but they also remain comfortable the whole time your using them. I love that they package these as a multipack. That way you have different ones for different days of your flow. Not all days are the same. Instead of having to buy three individual boxes of tampons. You get three in one box. I have not had issues with leaks either. You don't have to worry about leaks as long as your using the right absorbency. I think these are a great product and I highly recommend!
